Package Documentation: IDCeMPy¶

The zmiopc package implement mixture models for data in which the ordinal response variable is characterized by an excessive number of observations in one of the ordinal outcomes. The package supports estimation of the Zero-inflated Ordered Probit and Middle-inflated Ordered Probit Models.
